info.name: Makerkit API Documentation
info.description: Complete RESTful API for the Day News Multisite platform. Includes authentication, publishing, CRM, social features, e-commerce, ticketing, and more.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, password management, and session management.

item.name: Authenticate user and create access token.

request.description: Sends a password reset link to the user's email address.
Resets the user's password using the token from the password reset email.

item.name: Request magic link for passwordless authentication.

request.description: Authenticate using OAuth providers (Google, Facebook, etc.).
Revokes the current token and issues a new one.
Returns the authenticated user's profile with workspaces and tenant information.
Returns all active authentication tokens for the current user.
Revokes a specific authentication token by ID.

item.name: Logout from all devices (revoke all tokens).
Create relationship between organization and content
Verify phone and subscribe to SMS
Detect location from browser geolocation coordinates
Detect location from browser geolocation coordinates

variable.description: The ID of the ticket order.
The ID of the ticket order.

item.name: Add or update a business (upsert by google_place_id)
Add or update an RSS feed
Update article status (draft to published or vice versa)

item.description: Day News Post endpoints for creating, managing, and publishing content.

request.description: Changes post status from draft to published.
